entries.name: Emburse
entries.description: Emburse simplifies expense management with smart, automated solutions for business travel, invoicing, and corporate cards. It helps organizations control spending and improve financial visibility.

roles.title: Software Engineer III
roles.description: Building and maintaining the authentication platform, ensuring secure access and identity management across Emburse's product suite.

roles.title: Senior Automation Engineer
roles.description: Developed internal automation tools and collaborated with hundreds of Enterprise customers to ensure the platform met their specific business requirements and compliance needs.

entries.name: Freelance
entries.description: Independent software development services specializing in custom Discord solutions for digital communities and customer engagement.

roles.title: Freelance Developer
roles.description: Wrote custom software, found and managed clients, and delivered tailored solutions for their community and business needs.

entries.name: Bitacora Technology
entries.description: The first sneaker bot focused on the Mexican market, helping users secure limited-edition releases from local and international retailers.

roles.title: Founder
roles.description: Led all aspects of the business including software development, customer acquisition, and support. Built the product from the ground up and established the customer base.

entries.name: CookBeast
entries.description: CookBeast empowers sneaker resellers with timely release data, automation tools, and a supportive community. It helps users find profitable drops and stay ahead in the fast-paced resale market.

roles.title: Latam Co-Founder
roles.description: Led the expansion into Latin American markets, establishing operations and growing the user base across Mexico, Colombia, Argentina, and Chile.

roles.title: Software Developer
roles.description: Built monitoring software to track the most hyped sneaker releases and developed internal Discord tools for community management and engagement.
